arts.ttl: Barcelona chief speaks out on Nico Williams pursuit
arts.sum: Barcelona president Joan Laporta has this weekend provided a fresh insight into the club’s summer pursuit of Athletic Club star Nico Williams. The name of wide-man Williams, of course, took…

arts.ttl: Five goalscorers to look out for this weekend: Mbeumo to help cut down Forest
arts.sum: Bryan Mbeumo has been in sensational form for Brentford and is one of Tom Hill's five goalscorers to look out for this weekend.

arts.ttl: HUGE surprise in Nico Williams transfer saga that could change everything
arts.sum: “With the younger Williams brother now having the opportunity to join Real Madrid, he is postponing his departure from Athletic, despite having very important offers on the table from the Premier League, with Aston Villa at the head,” TodoFichajes claims. Nico Williams remains hot property in the transfer market, with many of Europe’s major clubs following the Athletic Club attacker.
